"Class Skills":
"Class Skills are the special skills which give each Class a unique advantage in battle.
You can acquire them by spending Skill Points.

Each Class has a wide variety of skills which take advantage of its unique characteristics. You can take whatever skills you want to customize your Class as you see fit."

"There are 2 types of Class Skill: <yellow>\"Passive Skills\"<c>, which always apply their effect once learned, and <yellow>\"Active Skills\"<c>, which must be registered to the Subpalette or Main Palette and activated."
